name: Boneyard
description:
Ever since acquiring a Vive, I've always wondered what it'd be like to explore Bungie's Destiny in VR. I kept waiting for the day for someone to toss together something simple, just so I could get a taste of that sweet, sweet forbidden fruit. No one built it. I figured a year is long enough to wait.

So, here you are. I present to you that sweet, forbidden fruit.

Three ships provided from Brent's STL generator at http://www.destinystlgenerator.com/ and then dropped them into a scene with some basic atmosphere and a ghost from blendswap (http://www.blendswap.com/blends/view/75732). There's no sound. It should also be fairly evident this is a one hour project.

Anyway, Destiny is awesome and it's super hard to go wrong with the quality of these assets. It's fun to just look at them in VR and imagine... what if?!

If someone wants to do a youtube video, drop me a link and I'll put it as the featured video for this. There's just no time to explain.
